title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka: A Touch of Traditional Splendor
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Embellished with high-quality Cubic Zirconia and a central Emerald (approx. 2 carat
good clarity). Features a lustrous South Sea Pearl drop.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a floral-inspired top stud featuring a halo of CZ stones surrounding a vibrant emerald. The middle section exhibits a stylized lotus petal design, intricately crafted with pave-set CZ. The Jhumka bell itself is a delicate openwork design with a prominent South Sea pearl at its base. Intricate craftsmanship reflects traditional South Indian artistry.
colors: and Creamy White (Pearl). A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian colors.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern evening wear.
description: This Jhumka showcases timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship, reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The emerald centerpiece symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, while the delicate design adds a touch of sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting luster and durability. A statement piece that blends tradition with modern sensibilities.
